abilityDescription: Automatically promotes latest tech or music hype only to admit it's 'just an opinion' moments later. Watch out for the flip-flop!
attackDescription: Sarabjeet Singh blasts you with relentless web dev updates and Spotify flexes while clinging to low-engagement pity parties. Brutally average!
description: The user is a nanobie-level web dev and part-time shitposter with modest engagement and a niche tech/music vibe, reflecting in mid-low hit points and attack damage. The ability mocks his contradictory tech enthusiasm and opinion-flip tweets. Attack highlights his low traction and self-pity posts. Weakness to roast matches his sensitivity to criticism, while resistance to cringe reflects his familiarity and immersion in awkward, low-impact posting. No furry or other niche types detected from content or images.
